Our Web Player with Track Details. Tune In!

Swiss based online House music radio station streaming in a variety of formats. Thanks to exclusive partnerships with successful electronic music labels we are able to play the newest and hottest tracks and mixes 24/7. Residents and other well known and international famous Djs have their own radio shows frequently. Electroradio.fm also broadcasts reguarly live from night clubs.
